product_vision.problem_statement: E-commerce brands are bleeding money on paid advertising with rising CPAs and no sustainable organic traffic moat. Meanwhile, AI assistants are becoming the new search engines, and brands without AEO (Agentic Engine Optimization) will become invisible to the next generation of shoppers.
